verses.verse: "For the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> a landowner <S%G3617><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out early <S%G260><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%> to hire <S%G3409><s%> laborers <S%G2040><s%> for his vineyard. <S%G290><s%>
"And when he had agreed <S%G4856><s%> with the laborers <S%G2040><s%> for a denarius <S%G1220><s%> for the day, <S%G2250><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> them into his vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

"And he went <S%G1831><s%> out about <S%G4012><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> and saw <S%G3708><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> in the market <S%G58><s%> place; <S%G58><s%>

and to those <S%G1565><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> 'You too <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> into the vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is right <S%G1342><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> you.' And [so] they went. <S%G565><s%>

"Again <S%G3825><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out about <S%G4012><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> and the ninth <S%G7067><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G5615><s%> thing. <S%G5615><s%>

"And about <S%G4012><s%> the eleventh <S%G1734><s%> [hour] he went <S%G1831><s%> out, and found <S%G2147><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing; <S%G2476><s%> and he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'Why <S%G5101><s%> have you been standing <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> long?'

"They said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Because <S%G3754><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> hired <S%G3409><s%> us.' He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'You too <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> into the vineyard. <S%G290><s%>'

"And when evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> the owner <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to his foreman, <S%G2012><s%> 'Call <S%G2564><s%> the laborers <S%G2040><s%> and pay <S%G591><s%> them their wages, <S%G3408><s%> beginning <S%G757><s%> with the last <S%G2078><s%> [group] to the first. <S%G4413><s%>'

"And when those <S%G3588><s%> [hired] about <S%G4012><s%> the eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> each <S%G303><s%> one <S%G303><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a denarius. <S%G1220><s%>

"And when those <S%G3588><s%> [hired] first <S%G4413><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> they thought <S%G3543><s%> that they would receive <S%G2983><s%> more; <S%G4183><s%> and they also <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> each <S%G303><s%> one <S%G303><s%> a denarius. <S%G1220><s%>
"And when they received <S%G2983><s%> it, they grumbled <S%G1111><s%> at the landowner, <S%G3617><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'These <S%G3778><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> men <S%G2078><s%> have worked <S%G4160><s%> [only] one <S%G1520><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and you have made <S%G4160><s%> them equal <S%G2470><s%> to us who <S%G3588><s%> have borne <S%G941><s%> the burden <S%G922><s%> and the scorching <S%G2742><s%> heat <S%G2742><s%> of the day. <S%G2250><s%>'

"But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G1520><s%> of them, 'Friend, <S%G2083><s%> I am doing <S%G91><s%> you no <S%G3756><s%> wrong; <S%G91><s%> did you not agree <S%G4856><s%> with me for a denarius <S%G1220><s%>?

'Take <S%G142><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is yours <S%G4674><s%> and go <S%G5217><s%> your way, <S%G5217><s%> but I wish <S%G2309><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> man <S%G2078><s%> the same <S%G2532><s%> as to you.

'Is it not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me to do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I wish <S%G2309><s%> with what <S%G3588><s%> is my own <S%G1699><s%>? Or <S%G2228><s%> is your eye <S%G3788><s%> envious <S%G4190><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> generous <S%G18><s%>?'
"Thus <S%G3779><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be first, <S%G4413><s%> and the first <S%G4413><s%> last. <S%G2078><s%>"

And as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was about <S%G3195><s%> to go <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> He took <S%G3880><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> [disciples] aside by themselves, <S%G2398><s%> and on the way <S%G3598><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them,

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we are going <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem; <S%G2414><s%> and the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and they will condemn <S%G2632><s%> Him to death, <S%G2288><s%>

and will deliver <S%G3860><s%> Him to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to mock <S%G1702><s%> and scourge <S%G3146><s%> and crucify <S%G4717><s%> [Him,] and on the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> He will be raised <S%G1453><s%> up. "

Then <S%G5119><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him with her sons, <S%G5207><s%> bowing <S%G4352><s%> down, <S%G4352><s%> and making <S%G154><s%> a request <S%G154><s%> of Him.

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "What <S%G5101><s%> do you wish <S%G2309><s%>?" She said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Command <S%G3004><s%> that in Your kingdom <S%G932><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of mine <S%G1473><s%> may sit, <S%G2523><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> on Your right <S%G1188><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> on Your left. <S%G2176><s%>"

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "You do not know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you are asking <S%G154><s%> for. Are you able <S%G1410><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> that I am <S%G3195><s%> about <S%G3195><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%>?" They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "We are able. <S%G1410><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "My cup <S%G4221><s%> you shall drink; <S%G4095><s%> but to sit <S%G2523><s%> on My right <S%G1188><s%> and on [My] left, <S%G2176><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is not Mine <S%G1699><s%> to give, <S%G1325><s%> but it is for those for whom <S%G3739><s%> it has been prepared <S%G2090><s%> by My Father. <S%G3962><s%>"
And hearing <S%G191><s%> [this,] the ten <S%G1176><s%> became indignant <S%G23><s%> with the two <S%G1417><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> them to Himself, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "You know <S%G3609><s%> that the rulers <S%G758><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> lord <S%G2634><s%> it over <S%G2634><s%> them, and [their] great <S%G3173><s%> men <S%G3173><s%> exercise <S%G2715><s%> authority <S%G2715><s%> over <S%G2715><s%> them.

" It is not so <S%G3779><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you shall be your servant, <S%G1249><s%>
and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to be first <S%G4413><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you shall be your slave; <S%G1401><s%>

just <S%G5618><s%> as the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> did not come <S%G2064><s%> to be served, <S%G1247><s%> but to serve, <S%G1247><s%> and to give <S%G1325><s%> His life <S%G5590><s%> a ransom <S%G3083><s%> for many. <S%G4183><s%> "
And as they were going <S%G1607><s%> out from Jericho, <S%G2410><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Him.

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> men <S%G5185><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> by the road, <S%G3598><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was passing <S%G3855><s%> by, cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us, Son <S%G5207><s%> of David! <S%G7035><s%>"

And the multitude <S%G3793><s%> sternly <S%G2008><s%> told <S%G2008><s%> them to be quiet; <S%G4623><s%> but they cried <S%G2896><s%> out all <S%G3173><s%> the more, <S%G3173><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us, Son <S%G5207><s%> of David! <S%G7035><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stopped <S%G2476><s%> and called <S%G5455><s%> them, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do you want <S%G2309><s%> Me to do <S%G4160><s%> for you?"
They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> [we want] our eyes <S%G3788><s%> to be opened. <S%G455><s%>"

And moved <S%G4697><s%> with compassion, <S%G4697><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> touched <S%G681><s%> their eyes; <S%G3659><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> they regained <S%G308><s%> their sight <S%G308><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> Him.
